item.title: Bangalore to Mangalore Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Mangalore can be an exciting journey, as you'll get to explore the pristine beaches, ancient temples, and vibrant culture of this coastal city in Karnataka. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Hassan -> Belur -> Charmady Ghat -> Mangaluru -> Sakleshpura -> Hassan -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Mangalore Sta
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
